item.title: 特朗普将启用拜登宽带计划的批评者监督该计划
item.description: 据三位知情人士透露，特朗普政府计划提名前总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）425 亿美元宽带资助计划的反对者来监督该计划，这让该计划的走向成疑。【原文：The Trump administration plans to nominate an opponent of former President Joe Biden’s $42.5 billion broadband funding initiative to oversee that program, according to three people with knowledge of the matter, putting its direction in doubt.】

item.title: 特朗普推迟对加拿大和墨西哥征收关税，铜和锌攀升
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统将对加拿大和墨西哥征收关税的时间推迟一个月后，铜和锌上涨，拖累美元走低。【原文：Copper and zinc rose after President Donald Trump delayed tariffs on Canada and Mexico by a month, dragging the US dollar lower.】

item.title: 特朗普重启贸易战，中国可能放松对人民币的控制
item.description: 货币交易员们正屏息等待中国下一次公布人民币每日参考汇率，一些人预计，如果唐纳德-特朗普的关税政策生效，中国政府将放松对人民币的严格控制。【原文：Currency traders are waiting with bated breath for China’s next daily reference rate for the yuan, with some expecting authorities to relax their tight grip, if Donald Trump’s tariffs go into effect.】

item.title: 中国加征关税的最后期限即将到来，特朗普计划与习近平通话
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）表示，他的政府计划与中国进行对话，这使得在他推迟对加拿大和墨西哥征收 10%关税数小时后即将生效的关税有可能得到缓和。【原文：US President Donald Trump said his administration plans to speak with China, raising the possibility of a potential reprieve on a 10% tariff set to take effect in hours after he delayed levies on Canada and Mexico.】

item.title: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司购买价值 5400 万美元的 Sirius XM 股票
item.description: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司和沃伦-巴菲特（Warren E Buffett）向美国证券交易委员会报告了天狼星 XM 控股公司股票的一系列内幕交易。【原文：Berkshire Hathaway and Warren E Buffett reported a series of insider transactions in Sirius XM Holdings Inc. stock to the US Securities and Exchange Commission.】

item.title: 特朗普关税逆转助长贸易纸老虎名声
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统承诺征收数千亿美元的关税，以重塑全球经济，甚至将矛头指向他的近邻。【原文：President Donald Trump pledged hundreds of billions in tariffs to remake the global economy and target even his closest neighbors.】

item.title: 关税困惑助推避风港竞价，黄金维持在历史高位附近
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税威胁和随后的关税延迟加剧了不确定性，支撑了避险需求，黄金在历史高位附近持稳。【原文：Gold was steady near a record high as President Donald Trump’s tariff threats and subsequent delays boosted uncertainty and supported haven demand.】

item.title: 新西兰住宅建筑批准量跌至六年新低
item.description: 由于高利率和经济衰退吓倒了购房者，开发项目停滞不前，2024 年新西兰的建筑审批数量降至六年来的最低点。【原文：New Zealand building approvals fell to a six-year low in 2024 as high interest rates and a recession spooked home buyers and stalled developments.】

item.title: Salesforce 裁员 1000 人，同时为人工智能招聘销售人员
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，随着新财年的开始，Salesforce 公司正在裁员，即使该公司同时还在招聘员工销售新的人工智能产品。【原文：Salesforce Inc. is cutting jobs as its latest fiscal year gets underway, according to a person familiar with the matter, even as the company simultaneously hires workers to sell new artificial intelligence products.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行招聘银行家负责杠杆融资市场，扩大在澳大利亚的业务
item.description: 法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas SA）在悉尼聘用了一名高级杠杆融资银行家，以扩大其在亚太地区最繁忙的债务市场之一的业务。【原文：BNP Paribas SA has hired a senior leveraged finance banker in Sydney as the French bank expands its presence in one of Asia Pacific’s busiest markets for the debt class.】

item.title: 特朗普将加拿大和墨西哥关税推迟一个月后石油下跌
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普将对美国最大的两个外国原油供应国征收关税的时间推迟一个月后，石油价格下跌。【原文：Oil declined after President Donald Trump delayed the start of tariffs against the US’s two biggest foreign suppliers of crude by a month.】

item.title: 法官对谷歌推翻史诗级应用胜诉的申请持怀疑态度
item.description: 旧金山联邦上诉法院的一个合议庭似乎对 Alphabet 公司的论点持怀疑态度，该公司称，它与苹果公司在智能手机领域的竞争足以证明有理由推翻陪审团宣布安卓应用程序非法垄断的判决。【原文：A federal appeals court panel in San Francisco appeared skeptical of Alphabet Inc.’s argument that its competition with Apple Inc. in smartphones is sufficient to justify overturning a jury verdict that declared an illegal monopoly for Android apps.】

item.title: 特朗普关税计划有可能破坏贸易，引发食品通胀
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统计划下个月对美国最大的一些农产品贸易伙伴征收关税，这有可能颠覆市场并引发食品价格上涨。【原文：President Donald Trump’s plans to impose tariffs on some of the US’s largest agricultural trade partners next month threaten to upend markets and unleash food-price inflation.】

item.title: 美元走强或加剧 540 亿美元资金从亚洲新兴市场股票流出
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税大棒意味着美元回升很可能成为亚洲股市的更大威胁，因为它削弱了经济增长放缓地区的降息空间。【原文：Donald Trump’s tariffs salvo means a resurgent dollar is likely to become an even bigger overhang for Asian stocks, as it erodes the room for interest-rate cuts in a region that has seen economic growth slow.】

item.title: 古尔斯比称特朗普政策可能减缓美联储的降息步伐
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长奥斯坦-古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）表示，在特朗普政府带来的不确定性不断增加的情况下，央行在降低借贷成本时应更加谨慎。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Austan Goolsbee said the central bank should proceed more cautiously in lowering borrowing costs amid mounting uncertainty introduced by the Trump administration.】

item.title: 走私三角钢琴显示特朗普向普京施压面临挑战
item.description: 尽管美国主导的对俄出口管制主要针对武器部件和高端芯片，但一种威胁性较小的产品却显示出唐纳德-特朗普要挤压弗拉基米尔-普京的经济有多么困难：日本三角钢琴。【原文：While US-led export controls on Russia have primarily targeted weapons components and high-end chips, a less threatening product shows just how hard it will be for Donald Trump to squeeze Vladimir Putin’s economy: Japanese grand pianos.】

item.title: 特朗普推迟关税后亚洲股市将上涨：市场综述
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统将美国对墨西哥和加拿大的关税推迟一个月并表示将与中国举行进一步会谈之后，亚洲股市将出现反弹。【原文：Stocks in Asia are set to rebound after President Donald Trump delayed US tariffs on Mexico and Canada for a month, and said he’d hold further talks with China.】

item.title: 澳大利亚财长查莫斯表示已为全球贸易战做好准备
item.description: 澳大利亚财长吉姆-查莫斯（Jim Chalmers）周二表示，澳大利亚已做好充分准备，以应对全球关税战，同时重申澳大利亚 "无法幸免 "紧张局势的升级。【原文：Australia is well prepared to navigate a global tariff war, Treasurer Jim Chalmers said Tuesday, while reiterating the country is “not immune” from escalating tensions.】

item.title: 芯片市场持续低迷，恩智浦销售预测令人失望
item.description: 恩智浦半导体公司（NXP Semiconductors NV）对第一季度营收作出了令人失望的预测，表明工业和汽车芯片的需求疲软仍在持续。【原文：NXP Semiconductors NV give a disappointing forecast for first-quarter revenue, signaling that sluggish demand for industrial and automotive chips is lingering.】

item.title: 关税威胁加剧，加拿大交易员转投安全赌注
item.description: 在贸易战升级引发周一大幅下挫之后，加拿大的资金经理们正准备迎接本周交易中更多的动荡。【原文：Canadian money managers are gearing up for more turbulence in trading this week after an escalating trade war sparked Monday’s sharp selloff.】

item.title: 年金销售激增，保险公司热捧证券化债务
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）称，保险公司正在抢购资产支持债券，为其年金产品的未来支付提供资金，这些产品的需求量创下了历史新高；预计这一趋势将持续下去。【原文：Insurance companies are snapping up asset-backed bonds to fund future payouts on their annuity products which are seeing record demand — a trend that is expected to continue, according to Morgan Stanley.】

item.title: 特朗普任命的华盛顿特区律师主动提出保护马斯克的 DOGE 员工
item.description: 新任命的美国哥伦比亚特区临时检察官表示，他将对任何阻碍或威胁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）政府效率部员工的人采取法律行动。【原文：The newly appointed interim US attorney for the District of Columbia said he would take legal action against anyone who impedes or threatens Elon Musk’s government-efficiency staff, raising the stakes after repeated confrontations between the group and civil servants at various US agencies.】

item.title: 新西兰政府考虑改变公司税设置
item.description: 新西兰总理克里斯托弗-卢克森（Christopher Luxon）表示，政府正在考虑修改今年预算中的税收设置，包括企业税率。【原文：New Zealand Prime Minister Christopher Luxon said the government is considering changes to tax settings in this year’s budget, including the corporate tax rate.】

item.title: 美国司机可能会看到油泵价格因特朗普关税而跳涨 15 美分

item.title: 美国监管机构调查 Crypto.com、Kalshi 的超级碗赌注
